about_the_game:
Embark on a magical adventure in the hidden object and puzzle game "Christmas Fables: Holiday Guardians DLC"! Mini-games, puzzles and hidden objects await you! Try to find all the hidden objects in the extra festive locations!
This downloadable content contains four new locations! Find a magical mirror that shows you the person you think of, learn more about Frosty’s story and pick a present for yourself in the Santa’s Toy Workshop!

You can learn new details about the characters and uncover all the secrets of the magical story. Unlock new achievements after completing all the quests!

🎄 THE TOY ASSEMBLY LINE
Explore a room full of Santa’s magic, where all toys are assembled! Choose the perfect toy for yourself and assemble it by yourself!

🎄 THE VILLAGE OF ELVES
The village of the elves is full of mysteries, but more mysterious is the cave, where a magical mirror is hidden! Try to find it!

🎄 THE BLIZZARD CASTLE
Do you want to know more about Frosty’s backstory? Then you should visit her blizzard castle and solve some riddles!

🎄 THE TOY WORKSHOP
In the bonus game Santa Claus wants to thank you again with a present! Visit the workshop and find a good one!

Saddle up the sleigh, pet the reindeer, and embark on a fairytale journey through the Christmas locations!

This downloadable content contains four new locations! Find a magical mirror that shows you the person you think of, learn more about Frosty’s story and pick a present for yourself in the Santa’s Toy Workshop!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/Windows 8/Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/Windows 8/Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space

short_description: Explore additional locations, find all the hidden items, and help Santa in a magical Christmas story!
